main event: Witness observed four bright objects moving over the city of Lindsay, California, resulting in the formulation of a V-shaped pattern.
interesting points: Objects were unusually bright, leading to initial speculation that they were satellites., The sighting was later questioned, with comments suggesting it might be stars due to no movement., The objects were observed for a duration of 13 minutes., Various hypotheses about the objects included balloons and aircraft., The observer did not have binoculars for a clearer view.
sighted object: four bright objects forming a V-shaped pattern
witness description: Civilian, supervisor, and good visibility conditions.
